Permutive (YC S14) | London, UK | Full-time | ONSITE | https://permutive.com

Permutive is building the infrastructure for realtime personalization. We're a small, tight-knit team with top-tier investors from London and SV, including Y Combinator.

We're looking for FP enthusiasts to develop our core product and help build an amazing technical team. Our ideal candidate has interests and experience in:

* Working extensively in functional languages: we use Haskell, Elm, and Scala (Scalaz).

* Building distributed systems: we run a stream data pipeline on AWS with Kafka, EC2, Postgres, DynamoDB, S3, and friends.

* Data engineering, particularly stream processing and event sourcing/CQRS.

* Developing and scaling APIs and a frontend products.

If you're interested, you can apply at https://permutive.workable.com or email jobs@permutive.com with your CV. Unfortunately we can't sponsor visas at the moment so you'll need to be eligible to work in the UK!
